cab.content: SECRET .OPERATIONS.From:- General Plumer, Italy To:- C.I.G.S., War Office.Handed in 12.45 a.m., 18-11-17.^^^^^^Received 4.20 a.m.,"19-11-17.0.17. Nov. 17.You havo received usual situation report to which I have nothing to add. I was at Italian H.Q. this morning and saw Diaz and Minister of War and Duke of Aosta. All were pleased with reoult of yesterday's operations. General atmosphere was more cheerful. Am considering tomorrow with Diaz and Foch proposals which may involve French and ourselves taking over portions of the forward line eventually. 7/ilson left this morning. Troops arriving according to programme.
